participant_1.background:
My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.
i work on a farm.
I found a geocache while riding my bike the other day.
I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time.
I moved to the mountains so my dogs could have more space to run and play.

participant_2.background:
I hunt, bike and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family.
i am a youtube.
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I love to eat pizza, it helps me to relax and forget about my anxiety.

content.text: Hello, I'm a fan of your youtube channel.
Hey, thank you! What's your favorite video?
I really liked the one where you went hunting with your family.
That was a lot of fun! We got some great pictures.
I'm sure you did! I'm not much of a hunter myself, but I can appreciate the beauty of nature.
That's true. I love being out in the woods. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I agree. I love taking my dogs for walks in the mountains.
That sounds nice! I'm sure your dogs love it too.
They do! They're always so excited to go for a hike.
I'm glad to hear that. Do you have any other pets?
No, just the dogs. Do you have any pets?
I have a parrot named Todd. He's a really funny bird.
I've never met a parrot before. Are they easy to take care of?
They can be, but it depends on the individual bird. Todd is pretty easygoing.
That's good. I'd love to have a parrot someday.
